PagOnline.PagOnlineHTML:
<style type="text/css">
#content{
	padding: 30px 0;  
}  
  
.tab_interna {
    text-align:left;
    color:#444444;
    font-size:11px;
}

.tab_interna td {
    border-left:#c0c0c0 1px solid;
    border-right:#c0c0c0 1px solid;
}

.tab_interna2 {
    width:100%;
    padding:2px;
}

.tab_interna2 th {
    background-color:#fafafa;
    text-align:center;
    font-weight:normal;
    color:#444444;
    line-height:20px;
    border:none;
    font-size:11px;
    padding:4px;
}

.tab_interna2 td {
    background-color:#ffffff;
    color:#444444;
    line-height:20px;
    border:none;
    padding:4px;
    border-bottom:#cccccc 1px dashed;
    font-size:11px;
    text-align:center;
}

.tab_interna3 {
    width:100%;
    padding:5px;
    line-height:20px;
}

.tab_interna3 .fontV1 {
    font-size:10px;
    display:inline;
}

.tab_interna3 td {
    border:none;
}

.tab_interna3 p {
    border:none;
    line-height:20px;
    padding:1px 0;
}

.tab_interna4 {
    width:100%;
    padding:5px;
    text-align:left;
}

.tab_interna4 td {
    border:none;
    text-align:left;
}

.img_left {
    float:left;
    _margin-left:-3px;
}

.img_right {
    float:right;
    _margin-right:-3px;
}

.payment_card {
    text-align:left;
    font-size:11px;
    vertical-align:middle;
    line-height:25px;
}

#boleto {
    padding-top:40px;
    color:#3E3E3E;
    text-align:center;
    background-image:url(num_pedido.gif);
    background-repeat:no-repeat;
    width:266px;
    height:80px;
    _height:122px;
    display:block;
    position:relative;
}

#boleto .cod {
    font-size:18px;
    font-weight:bold;
    line-height:22px;
}

#boleto .mail {
    padding-top:30px;
    font-size:11px;
    text-decoration:underline;
}
  
/* ---- Estilo do Gateway ----*/
  
.button_imagens{
    width: 247px !important;  
  	height: 34px !important;
}
  
.tab_interna{
    background: #fff;  
} 
  
.tit_dept{
	margin-top: 50px;  
}
  
</style>
[A0]
